descriptions.description: <color argb=#FF8692d4>A mix of Slayer and other Free For All games. Here, you must stand on your own.</color>|r|n|r|nMax Party Size: 6
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Straight up Team Slayer games on varied maps. Work with your team to outkill your opponents.</color>|r|n|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 4
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Assorted games for teams of two. Work together or die alone, teamwork is critical here.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 2|r|nMax Party Size: 4
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Long sight lines and long rifles. Precision combat over great distance. This is a team-focused playlist.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 4
<color argb=#FF8692d4>MLG rules and variants for Team Slayer and Objective games. For details, see www.mlgpro.com/playlist.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 4
<color argb=#FF8692d4>No shields, no sensors. Just you, your BR, and a lot of headshots.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>A mix of Slayer and other Free For All games. Go it alone, or join as a group and skirmish.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Assorted Team Slayer games on varied maps. Work with your team to outkill your opponents.</color>|r|n|r|nTeam Size: 5|r|nMax Party Size: 10
<color argb=#FF8692d4>A wide assortment non-Slayer objective games. Mix things up a bit, with a team or with an entire party.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Action Sack is back, offering up a whopping 0 EXP and a sloppy mess of crazy social fun.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>A mix of games for more than two teams. Like Free For All, but with a partner to work with. </color>|r|n|r|nTeam Size: 2|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Got Mythic?  Get your new hotness fix with some Team Slayer and Objective on all six Mythic Maps.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>A delectable mix of Slayer and Objective modes. Big teams, big carnage, big fun.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nTeam Size: 6-8|r|nMax Party Size: 16
<color argb=#FF8692d4>A place for players new to Halo 3 to learn the ropes and get up to speed. Start here!</color>|r|n|r|nUnranked 4 Player FFA. Unavailable after 9 games or 4 EXP.
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Rockin’ Recon yet?  Snag 7 EXP in this FFA playlist featuring Mythic Maps and you’ll be one step closer.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nMax Party Size: 7
<color argb=#FF8692d4>The dead rise again! The clammy claw of the walking dead reaches for you from the grave once more!</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nMax Party Size: 13
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Marksmanship takes a back seat to fast driving. Get to the destinations to win!</color>|r|nHeroic\Legendary DLC Req.|r|nTeam Size: 2|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Currently Testing: MCC Map Variants</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nMax Party Size: 16
<color argb=#FF8692d4>A 4v4 mix of Slayer and Objective gametypes on a whole mess of your own stinkin’ community created maps.</color>|r|nHeroic\Mythic DLC Req.|r|nTeam Size: 3-4
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Assorted non-Slayer, round based objective games. Steady strategy trumps steady aim here.</color>|r|n|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>The ultimate test. One on one games on custimized versions of Halo 3's maps.</color>|r|n|r|nMax Party Size: 1|r|nHeroic and Legendary Map Packs required.
<color argb=#FF8692d4>It’s hammer time! It’s also ranked.  Seriously.  Play to win or, you know, just for fun.</color>|r|nHeroic\Mythic DLC Req.|r|nTeam Size: 3-4|r|nMax Party Size: 8
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Mythic mixes with Legendary, Heroic, and classic maps for FFA brawlin’.</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nMax Party Size: 12
Hardcore|r|nHalo 3 with a competitive tilt. Expect the best of the best here.
<color argb=#FF8692d4>5-Minute Brawl for Double EXP!</color>|r|nAll DLC Required|r|nMax Party Size: 16
7 ON THE 7TH|r|nCelebrate Bungie’s favorite number in this special playlist.
<color argb=#FF8692d4>Go it alone. Eight player FFA exclusively on DLC maps.</color>|r|nAll DLC Req|r|nMax Party Size: 8
DLC|r|nPlaylists focusing on Halo 3 DLC Maps. Download DLC maps to access
